Let us read some more in the second half of the wikipedia page!

Here in the wikipedia article you can find information on what allergies are and even the signs of symptoms. It is important to check the accuracy of the information as it is not always correct. # You can check the sources of the information for its reliability, by looking at the little numbers right next to the text. Click on them and it will take you to the bibliography below.
_user_, why don't we read over this page a little.

_user_, Here you can see the results of our search for information on Mary Poppins. From here, you can click on any of the links to see if any of the websites seem like good sources for the information you want.
Wow! This is neat Cristina. What happens if we click on one of the links and we don't think the website is very helpful?

If you click on a link, but do not think it was the best one for your search, just click the back button on your browser. # The back button is usually close to the search bar and has an arrow pointing to the left. On our pages, you will see that it is highlighted in blue.
_user_, does that make sense to you? Let's click on these links to see which one will give us the most information.
_user_, you really helped me learn a lot about online research today! We covered a lot of information.
_user_, thanks so much for helping Jordan out!
I think I’m going to go buy the i drops now. I’ll see you next time _user_!
I’ll see you two soon, thanks again! Good bye!
I see now, the second link is also a blog article. Boy there are so many of those!
right Jordan! On the internet anyone can post on any topic! That is why looking at where the article comes from is very important!
Thanks! I'm learning so much from the both of you!
I will go with your recommendations! Thanks again!
Yes Jordan, now you can do some shopping!
oh thanks, I guess I should have seen that the second link was a news blog, so it wouldn’t be as reliable.
that’s right Jordan, you are learning!!
wikipedia is a very commonly used site for general information.
Wow Cristina thanks! Let me look at the wikipedia page then.
I have been reading about the signs and symptoms of allergies and wikipedia says that many allergies come from pollen.
That’s right Jordan. Pollen allergies are very common, especially in the summer.
Really Cristina? Well then I would like to look for more information on pollen allergies. My allergies get really bad during the summer.
Let’s go back to the previous search page.
Jordan, are you seeing links to the information that you need?
Maybe, there are too many options. Which one should I click on?

well Jordan, usually the top few links that show up after a search are the links with the most relevant information to what you are trying to find. # If you are looking for general information on allergies, I think the best source is: Wikipedia!
The internet is really powerful! I wonder if I can search some other things using it.
Yes Jordan, you can find quite a lot of information on a variety of topics using the search engines on the web.
Let me think. I have some very bad allergy problems and I would like to learn more about it. _user_ can you help me?
That is a good topic for us to research next. Let us go back to the search engine.
From what I’ve found out so far, it seems that the fact that my eyes itch a lot is most likely due to allergies. _user_, can you help me find some medication for it?
Jordan, I think what you need are some allergy eye drops.
Item.speech: Jordan, I think what you need are some allergy i drops.

Item.text: yes, it seems that that’s what I need.
okay, let’s go back to the search engine.

_user_ hi! I have heard that I can find information about almost anything on the internet. I’m starting to learn how to use search engines and I was wondering if you would be interested in helping me.
_user_, this can be a useful skill to have.
For example, the other day I saw the movie, Mary Poppins, with a friend and I want to find out more about that movie.
Well, then a good place for us to start learning about internet research would be to look up information about the movie online.
Yes, that is what my friend said also. I didn’t want to tell him that I’ve never used a search engine. _user_, can you help me find a website that has information on Mary Poppins?
I want to get something cheap.
I guess I should click on the first link: shop for eye drops for allergies on this search engine.
Item.speech: I guess I should click on the first link: shop for i drops for allergies on this search engine.

Item.text: Yes, that would be a good place to start.
I don't know which one to choose!
This is interesting. I think now I would like to know how to treat a pollen allergy.
well, this site has some of that information at the bottom. But you can always search for it again.
_user_, you seem to be really good with this, while I read this page, can you help me search for treatments?
_user_, let us go back to the previous search page
I think the second link looks good to me, but I'm not sure. _user_, which link would you click?
This website has a ton of information! I wonder if we can find out the name of the actress who played Mary Poppins.
